markdown.markdown:
#### [Global Oil Production](https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/oil-production-by-country?time=earliest..1923)
* Oil production by Country and by Year 
* Inormation from 1900 to 2022. 
* The unit of analysis is Terawatt-Hour (TWh). 
* The most relevant information is the top 5 countries with more production over time.


### Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
#### [U.S. Inflation Rate](https://data.oecd.org/price/inflation-cpi.htm) 
* U.S. Inflation from the Consumer Price Index variations by Month and by Year.
* Information from 1956 to 2022.
* The unit of analysis is variations in decimal points.

### International Monetary Fund (IMF)
#### [U.S. Interest Rate](https://data.imf.org/regular.aspx?key=61545855) 
* U.S. Interest Rates by Year.
* Information from 1994 to 2022
* The unit of analysis is U.S. Dollars

### Yahoo Finance
#### [Crude Oil Price](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/CL%3DF/chart?p=CL%3DF#)
* Crude Oil Price by Day, by Month and by Year
* Information from 2000 to 2022
* The unit of analysis is the price of the barrel in U.S Dollars

#### [Energy Sector Index](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/IYE?p=IYE&.tsrc=fin-srch)
* Energy Sector Index by Day, by Month and by Year
* Information from 2000 to 2022
* The unit of analysis is U.S. Dollars

#### [Transportation Index](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/IYT?p=IYT&.tsrc=fin-srch)
* Transportation Sector Index by Day, by Month and by Year
* Information from 2004 to 2022
* The unit of analysis is U.S. Dollars

#### [Staples Index](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/IYK?p=IYK&.tsrc=fin-srch)
* Staples Sector Index by Day, by Month and by Year
* Information from 2000 to 2022
* The unit of analysis is U.S. Dollars
